full_summary:
### Canada Quarantine Case Management Project

**Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)**

#### Title
Support to Canada’s Quarantine Case Management and systems supporting the implementation of border measures and the enforcement of the Quarantine Act

#### Reference Number
PW-22-01011865

#### Solicitation Number
1000244598

#### Closing Date
2022-11-15T14:00:00

#### Notice Type
Request for Proposal (RFP)

#### Procurement Method
Competitive - Selective Tendering

#### Purpose
This request is to provide Professional Services to support the implementation of the Quarantine Case Management System, recognizing the ongoing threat posed by the COVID-19 pandemic to the Canadian public and internationally. The Joint Agency will work collaboratively to deliver enhancements to the existing system, optimizing case management, contact tracing, and analytics capabilities.

#### Requirements

*   Phase I: A team of 6 resources for an estimated 1,440 days to support the requirements of the Quarantine Case Management System.
*   Phase II (Optional): A team of 19 resources for an estimated 2,280 days to continue the enhancements initiated.

#### Contract Duration
One (1) year from the contract award date, with one (1) optional year period.

#### Security Requirements
The Public Services sector standard (SP) SRCL #06 applies.
 
#### Submission Instructions
Respondents must be eligible Supply Arrangement Holders with a Tier 1 rating in the required Specialized Knowledge Area (SKA) and specific categories of resources.

#### Submission Documents
Interested parties must submit a proposal in response to the RFP. Please direct all inquiries to the Contracting Authority, Beverly Shawana.

**Attached Documents**

N/A

**Language**
English and French

**Attachment Details**
None
